name: Ninja Forms – Submission Limit Cookie
author: Hannes Etzelstorfer

sections.description:
Simply limit form submissions per user

You can set a timeout for submissions per user so you can make sure a user doesn\’t submit a form too often. This is especially useful if you use NinjaForms for any kind of votings for example when you create a photo contest with Ninja Forms Multimedia Fields.

No need to register users

Of course a cookie is not as save as validating logged in users but it is fast and simple and you don\’t force your visitors to create an account.

For all kind of votings and polls

Check out the image voting demo here

More NinjaForms add-ons

  • NinjaForms Excel Export
  • NinjaForms CleverReach: Connect your form to your CleverReach E-Mail Marketing Account
  • NinjaForms Multimedia Field: Add votings and star ratings for images, videos and music to your forms
  • WP HTML Mail: create beautiful emails for your form submissions
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
